publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2290 Mr Adam Ingram: National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwickâ€”That the Parliament believes that the building of a new National Air Traffic Control Centre at Prestwick must proceed without further delay in the interests of public safety and the economic well-being of Scotland and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the necessary representations to ensure that public investment delivers a fully operational centre no later than 2007 as currently planned. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Brian Adam*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Michael Matheson*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2290 National Air Traffic Control Centre, Prestwick (lodged on 3 October 2001) Fiona McLeod*
